messages: XA's room seems to have once functioned as a kind of hub,
though the doors look less than functional at the moment.
This place might have been glorious once, but it seems that
time has not been kind to it. The edges of its banners are
fraying and grungy, and you're not sure you'll ever get the
"used castle smell" out of your hat.
It's some kind of orange, spider-shaped robot. It looks as
though it might have the power to scoot around without
You looked at the save floppy.
Wow, someone 3D-printed a save icon. What will they think
